title: Is it beneficial to read a novel twice? - Quora

response.answer_text: Human brain does not retains every information it processes. If you need to have a thorough understanding of the particular novel or book, needless to say, you have to read it more than once. However, if it's some random fiction novel you came across and liked in the first reading, there's no need to read it twice. Save your time and you can read more.
